word_mean: 木质部：在木质植物中从根部向上传导水分和己溶盐类的组织，特征为有管胞

sentence.Network_en: Sapwood contains xylem vessels, but not as strong as heartwood.
sentence.Network_cn: 边材含有木质导管, 但不如中心木质那样坚硬.

sentence.Network_en: The xylem of ferns and conifers contains only tracheids.
sentence.Network_cn: 蕨类植物和针叶树的木质部仅含有管胞.

sentence.Network_en: Secondary xylem consists of pitted vessels, parenchyma fibers and rays.
sentence.Network_cn: 次生木质部由孔纹导管 、 薄壁组织及射线所组成.

list.abs: ...维管形成层的一部分及木栓形成层也都发生于中柱鞘。(2)初生木质部(primary xylem)。初生木质部位于根的中央.
xylem fiber 木纤维xylem parenchyma 木薄壁组织xylose 木糖
(2)次生木质部(secondary xylem):由形成层细胞向内分裂产生的细胞分化而来,位于初生木质部之外,其中可看到横切面上细胞腔较大的导管及木.
木纤维(Xylem fiber),又称木浆环保纤维,属于再生纤维素纤维。木纤维是指由木质化的增厚的细胞壁和具有细裂缝状纹孔的纤维细胞所构成的机械组织,是构成木质部的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Greek xulon 'wood' + the passive suffix -ēma

means.word_mean: 1. the woody part of plants: the supporting and water-conducting tissue, consisting primarily of tracheids and vessels

auth_sentence.content: The dicotyledonous woody xylem is also absent.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The dicotyledonous woody xylem is also absent.

auth_sentence.content: The xylem in trees, through which water rises to the leaves, consists of spaces left by dead cells.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The xylem in trees, through which water rises to the leaves, consists of spaces left by dead cells.

auth_sentence.content: But later cells, the later xylem cells are much more like a cocktail stirring straw, so very little intercellular space.
